verses.roman:
sa tena samanujñātaḥ
suhṛdbhiś cānumoditaḥ
āyayau dvārakāṁ bhūyaḥ
sātyaki-pramakhair vṛtaḥ

synonyms: saḥ—He, Lord Kṛṣṇa; tena—by him, Arjuna; samanujñātaḥ—given leave; su-hṛdbhiḥ—by His well-wishers; ca—and; anumoditaḥ—allowed; āyayau—He went; dvārakām—to Dvārakā; bhūyaḥ—again; sātyaki-pramukhaiḥ—by those headed by Sātyaki; vṛtaḥ—accompanied.
translation: Then Lord Kṛṣṇa, given leave by Arjuna and other well-wishing relatives and friends, returned to Dvārakā with Sātyaki and the rest of His entourage.
